```{r, include = FALSE}
  paste0("[", prefix, id, "](", url, ")")
}

  "November 13", # day 13
  "November 16", # day 14

)

  "https://classroom.github.com/a/0p7_9UtF", # 02

)

slides <- sprintf("https://rokko-ma18q3.github.io/material/day%02d/day%02d.html", 1:15, 1:15)

```
